scripts.export-abis: bash -c 'echo "// Auto-generated" > ../engagement-sdk/src/abi/abis.ts && for f in artifacts/contracts/**/*.json; do name=$(basename "$f" .json); if jq -e ".abi" "$f" > /dev/null; then jq -r --arg name "$name" ".abi | \"export const $name = \" + (tojson) + \" as const;\"" "$f" >> ../engagement-sdk/src/abi/abis.ts; fi; done'
